name: college-scheduling-system
description: Automatic staff scheduling system for colleges

scripts.setup: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { Pool } = require('pg'); const fs = require('fs'); const pool = new Pool({ connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL }); const sql = fs.readFileSync('./scripts/01-init-database.sql', 'utf8'); pool.query(sql).then(() => { console.log('Database initialized'); pool.end(); }).catch(err => { console.error('Database error:', err); pool.end(); process.exit(1); });"
